r.d: This extension provides an IBM database driver for PDO. This driver supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, Apache Derby databases and IDS (Informix Data Server).
r.n: * 2021-09-30: 1.4.2 - Enable liveness checks on all platforms - Fix build issue with ulong on some platforms (did not affect Linux/IBM i) - Remove spurious warnings from closing the environment handle on IBM i - Enable processing driver options before connection (fixes naming mode issues on IBM i) - Getter for current naming mode on IBM i
